name: Beige and Brown Youtube by Lerkero
description: Use of beige, brown, red, and black colors to make Youtube more colorful. Notes are included in the CSS so that you can easily edit color changes.
additional_info:
Update: October 17, 2014: Edited to match Youtube's new header code.
Update: April 29, 2014: Edited to match new drop-down menu on youtube's left side.

Notes are included in the CSS to identify the code. If there are any concerns or suggestions please let me know. I am not an expert CSS coder, but I wanted to take the time to make some of my most visited websites less bland in color.
